tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Performance (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    battery_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
   device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   location TEXT,
   firmware_version FLOAT,
   last_reported_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReports (
   report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   device_id UUID REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id),
   report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   cpu_utilization FLOAT,
   memory_utilization FLOAT,
   storage_utilization FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE device_logs ( 
 log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 device_id UUID, 
 log_message TEXT, 
 log_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
 FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_data(device_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE device_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    report_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    report_type VARCHAR(255),
    report_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE device_errors (
    error_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    error_code INT,
    error_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
